text:
Since announcing the wonderful - if slightly unsurprising - news that she's expecting her first baby with Tristan Thompson, Khloe Kardashian has gone bananas for posting photos of her baby bump on social media. So here are all her glorious pregnancy photos so far.

1 The one where she is "bored AF" Khloe Kardashian Waiting for a baby can be sooooooooooo boring.

2 The one on the birthing ball Khloe Kardashian Just getting some practice in with her birthing ball...

3 The one with "Mommy and Daddy" Mommy and Daddy 📸 @sashasamsonova A post shared by Khloé (@khloekardashian) on Mar 26, 2018 at 6:50am PDT How good-looking can two people be?!?!

4 The one with the stretchy jeans Hey there Good Mama! A post shared by Khloé (@khloekardashian) on Mar 22, 2018 at 2:09pm PDT Now that is how you do maternity jeans...

5 The gorgeous lingerie portrait 📸 @sashasamsonova A post shared by Khloé (@khloekardashian) on Mar 21, 2018 at 6:01am PDT

8 The maternity jeans topless photoshoot Good American

9 The eight month pregnancy bump @goodamerican #GoodMama 💞👖Launches Thursday 3.15.2018 A post shared by Khloé (@khloekardashian) on Mar 12, 2018 at 4:39pm PDT

10 The one from the baby shower 💗 A post shared by Khloé (@khloekardashian) on Mar 11, 2018 at 6:49pm PDT

12 The OGs OGs A post shared by Khloé (@khloekardashian) on Mar 9, 2018 at 7:00am PST

13 The eight months pregnant bump 💗 Kyoto Khlo 💗 8 Month Bump 💗 A post shared by Khloé (@khloekardashian) on Mar 2, 2018 at 7:13pm PST

14 The I'm messing with y'all bump Bamboo Forest with my 🐼 A post shared by Khloé (@khloekardashian) on Mar 2, 2018 at 6:00pm PST Ignore everything we just said about her head-to-toe blue look because Khloe is clearly just being a big trickster after she also stepped out in this completely pink look.

15 The one with the possible gender hint 💙 有難い 💙 A post shared by Khloé (@khloekardashian) on Mar 2, 2018 at 12:38pm PST We know how much those damn Kardashians like to wind us up, but is Khloe trying to tell us something with this head-to-toe blue look?

16 The one with all the sparkles 💌 What’s meant to be will always find its way 💌 A post shared by Khloé (@khloekardashian) on Feb 28, 2018 at 2:06pm PST That dress and those earrings are da bomb (are young people still saying that?).

17 The eight-month bump Khloe Kardashian HER BABY'S DUE NEXT MONTH, PEOPLE!

18 The one in virginal white. lol With great love... 💌 A post shared by Khloé (@khloekardashian) on Feb 21, 2018 at 8:38am PST Khloe sent us this bump update with "great love", and it's making us feel like we're right there with her!

19 The one with the silky dressing gown Khloe Kardashian Being pregnant really take it out of you, so Khloe knows she needs plenty of sleep.

21 The one celebrating Valentine's Day Khloe Kardashian Khloe was spending Valentine's Day with her whole family when she posted this photo.

22 The one with the 29-week bump! Baby mama KoKo! 29 Weeks and counting ❤️ Glam: @styledbyhrush Hair: @andrewfitzsimons Hair Color: @traceycunningham1 A post shared by Khloé (@khloekardashian) on Feb 6, 2018 at 3:52pm PST Khloe is over seven months pregnant now, and shared two gorgeous photos of her bump along with the caption, "Baby mama KoKo! 29 weeks and counting".

23 The one celebrating Kim's new perfume Kim Kardashian Snapchat Khloe and her bump took to Kim's Snapchat to celebrate Kim's new perfume collection by smashing a chocolate version of her Ride Or Die fragrance.

26 The one with Mom and Dad ❥ Mom and Dad ❥ A post shared by Khloé (@khloekardashian) on Jan 2, 2018 at 12:44pm PST Or Mum and Dad as us Brits would say...

27 The one with the due date ❥ Officially 6 months ❥ A post shared by Khloé (@khloekardashian) on Jan 2, 2018 at 12:31pm PST Hooray! We now know when Khloe Jr./Tristan Jr. is due thanks to Khloe revealing that she's six months pregnant.

Anna Lewis News Editor Anna Lewis is the News Editor at Delish UK, which means she’s always either writing about food, cooking food or eating food.
